ideas.title: Estimating Dynamic Treatment Effects Using Causal Graphs in Event Studies
justification_evidence: Causal graphs can enhance the estimation of dynamic heterogeneous treatment effects by explicitly modeling dependencies and confounders, leading to more accurate causal inference in event studies.
red_flags: Graph specification risk; unobserved confounding remains possible
